title: source
description: Image source used to create a texture. Image source can be defined by an array of URI or `bufferView`s.

internalFormat.gltf_detailedDescription: The texture's internal format.  Valid values correspond to GL enums: `6406` (ALPHA), `6409` (LUMINANCE), `6410` (LUMINANCE_ALPHA), `32849` (RGB8), `32854` (RGBA4), `32855` (RGB5_A1), `32856` (RGBA8), `35905` (SRGB8), `35907` (SRGB8_ALPHA8), `36194` (RGB565)

uris.description: The array with uris of the images.
uris.gltf_detailedDescription: The array with uris of the images.  Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.  The image format must match mimeType.

bufferViews.description: The array with indices of the bufferViews that contains the images. Use this instead of the `uris` property.
